mapper.select: SELECT id, name, product_desc, img_addr, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, point, create_time, update_time, enable_status, shop_id, product_category_id FROM tb_product ORDER BY priority DESC

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.product_desc, p.img_addr, p.normal_price, p.promotion_price, p.priority, p.point, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.enable_status, p.shop_id AS s_id, p.product_category_id AS pc_id FROM tb_product p, tb_shop s, tb_product_category pc WHERE p.shop_id = s.id AND p.product_category_id = pc.id AND p.id = #{id}

SELECT id, name, product_desc, img_addr, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, point, create_time, update_time, enable_status, shop_id, product_category_id FROM tb_product WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY priority DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product( name, product_desc, img_addr, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, point, enable_status, create_time, update_time, product_category_id, shop_id) VALUES ( #{name}, #{productDesc}, #{imgAddr}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotionPrice}, #{priority}, #{point}, #{enableStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{productCategory.id}, #{shop.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product SET product_category_id = NULL WHERE product_category_id = #{productCategoryId}
